The project was a plug-in project with a shared launch configuration stored in the project's ".settings" folder.

fixed in HEAD

we were inadvertantly passing null to a containers findMember(..) method, causing this error.

Added in a null check and logic to set the mapping in the event a main type name is not present.

see LaunchConfigurationProjectMainTypeChange#perform(...)
